alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 11:04AM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with locally up to 8 inches on benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The heavy, wet snow has the potential to cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
